channel.title: How to make items 2h?
channel.description: This is a 637 source and just about all the normal 2h items are 2h except for the dh axe.. i can equip a drag defender with it, a dfs with it (only ones ive tried so far but im guessing all other ones too) while a gmaul/bow/ags/d2h none of those weapons can wield both that weapon and a drag defender/dfs with them... so how do i make it so that the dh axe cant either?

item.title: How to make items 2h?
item.dc:creator: @cocky cocky
item.description:
@cocky wrote:

This is a 637 source and just about all the normal 2h items are 2h except for the dh axe… i can equip a drag defender with it, a dfs with it (only ones ive tried so far but im guessing all other ones too) while a gmaul/bow/ags/d2h none of those weapons can wield both that weapon and a drag defender/dfs with them… so how do i make it so that the dh axe cant either?
